name: Pawggle
description:
One simple rule: Eliminate all the red pegs from the game board before running out of balls.

Pawggle is a casual Peggle/Pachinko style game but, this time, you step away from the visor.
Step into a world where you become the guiding hand for your furry companions, aiding them by strategically placing blue pegs.

Features:

  • Assist five adorable fur creatures
  • Conquer a series of challenging levels ensuring you never run out of balls
  • Exercise your skill and try being number one on the leaderboard

Join the fun and experience the joy of Pawggle as you master the art of the peg!
